Apache Maven Doxia Sitetools 2.0.0-M1 Released

Mar 28, 2022 â€¢ {"display_name"=>"Karl-Heinz Marbaise", "login"=>"khmarbaise", "email"=>"khmarbaise@apache.org"}

The Apache Maven team is pleased to announce the release of the
Doxia Site Tools Version 2.0.0-M1,
Released

Doxia Sitetools is an extension of base Doxia component that generates either
HTML sites, consisting of decoration and content that was generated by Doxia,
or documents like RTF or PDF.

You can download the appropriate sources etc. from the download page:

https://maven.apache.org/doxia/doxia-sitetools/download.cgi

Release Notes – Maven Doxia base – Version 2.0.0-M1

You can download the appropriate sources etc. from the download page.

Release Notes – Maven Doxia Sitetools – Version 2.0.0-M1

  • New Feature:

    • DOXIASITETOOLS-238 – Pass input file name as reference to parser

  • Tasks:

    • DOXIASITETOOLS-156 – Fail if deprecated ${reports}, ${parentProject} or ${modules} is found
    • DOXIASITETOOLS-239 – Remove Doxia Sitetools Doc Renderer
    • DOXIASITETOOLS-241 – Replace Plexus Container Default with Sisu Plexus Shim
    • DOXIASITETOOLS-242 – Remove all deprecated code

  • Dependency upgrade:

    • DOXIASITETOOLS-240 – Upgrade to Doxia 2.0.0-M1

Enjoy,

-The Apache Maven team
